CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 18, 1945, pg. 13, reads: "Glad Tidings - These three ladies smile as they realize at last that the war is over and the lights have come on again all over the world. Left to right: Jocelyn Tate, Zora Christine Nelson and Mrs. Toni Carter Smith. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Jocelyn Tate, Zora Christine Nelson, and Toni Carter Smith, posed in Loendi Club
